CookieBanner.basic_info: We use cookies to ensure the best experience in our site.

FacebookProvider.error_message_impossible_to_log_in: There was an error when trying to log with Facebook.
FacebookProvider.error_message_possibly_blocked: There was an error when trying to log with Facebook, You may have some extenion in your browser that is blocking the connexion.

FacebookRaffle.draw_subheading: People will be able to participate by logging in with the Facebook accounts
FacebookRaffle.field_label_when_to_toss: Choose when results will be published
FacebookRaffle.html_description: Create a public raffle where participants will be able to join by login with the Facebook accounts.
FacebookRaffle.html_keywords: raffle in facebook, assign prizes, countdown, join raffle, public results
FacebookRaffle.unable_to_register_in_raffle: There was an error when trying to register in the raffle. Please try again later
FacebookRaffle.you_are_registered_as_username: You are registered in the raffle as {{username}}

RandomNumber.certified_draw_description: If you want to make a public raffle to ensure an impartial result you should create a public raffle.
RandomNumber.draw_subheading: Simple random number generator. Choose the range and the amount of numbers to generate.
RandomNumber.error_field_message_min_results: You must generate at least one number
RandomNumber.error_form_invalid_ranges: The chosen range (numbers between {{min}} and {{max}}) is not valid
RandomNumber.error_form_range_not_big_enough: The range is not big enough
RandomNumber.html_description: Generate random numbers between two numbers, with or without repetitions. ChooseRandom's random number generator is quick and simple.

RecentDrawsPage.delete_all_recent_draws_modal_content: Raffles are only removed from your history, participants will still be able to access them if they have the link.
RecentDrawsPage.delete_all_recent_draws_modal_title: Do you want to clear your history of raffles?
RecentDrawsPage.delete_recent_draw_modal_content: This raffle will only be removed from your history of recent raffles, participants who have the link will still be able to access it.

SpinArrow.html_description: Do you need to decide who wil be the chosen one? Spin an arrow online
SpinArrow.html_keywords: spin arrow online, spinner, game, choose randomly
SpinArrow.learn_more_content: This arrow works best in mobile devices. Place it in the middle of a group, touch it to make it spin and the pointed person will be the winner. You can also use it as a random compass when you need to know where to go
SpinArrow.learn_more_title: What can an arrow be used for?
SpinArrow.touch_to_toss: Hit the arrow to make it spin
